publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5095 Lewis Macdonald: Opening of Union Square, Aberdeen—That the Parliament welcomes the opening of the Union Square shopping centre in Aberdeen; notes the multi-million investment in both the rail and bus stations at Guild Street; believes that city centre regeneration is key to the future prosperity of Scotland’s cities and regions, and looks forward to the tourism and economic benefits that the development will bring.

S3M-5095 Opening of Union Square, Aberdeen (lodged on 30 October 2009) Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*, Nanette Milne*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Claire Baker*, Pauline McNeill*, Richard Baker*, Nigel Don*
S3M-5095 Opening of Union Square, Aberdeen (lodged on 30 October 2009) John Park*, Des McNulty*, Maureen Watt*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-5095 Opening of Union Square, Aberdeen (lodged on 30 October 2009) Hugh Henry*, Jamie Stone*
S3M-5095 Opening of Union Square, Aberdeen (lodged on 30 October 2009) Gil Paterson*, Ken Macintosh*
